text:
Here's the Gorgeous Full Version of Ariana Grande and John Legend's "Beauty and the Beast" 
Ever just the same, ever a surprise. Most Popular By Mehera Bonner Feb 3, 2017 The world got to enjoy a snippet of John Legend and Ariana Grande singing "Beauty and the Beast" in the film's final trailer , but good news: you can now listen to the full song. In other words, bless up. The duet is currently available to purchase on iTunes (note: Emma Watson sings the in-movie version), but if you're impatient or don't want to throw down the $$$, feel free to listen below. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "Stepping into the shoes of an Oscar and Grammy Award-winning classic is not small potatoes," producer Ron Fair said in a statement. "But with today's two greatest singers—John Legend and Ariana Grande—we are bringing the song back with a new school/old school fresh treatment that shows the soulfulness and power of what a great melody and lyric can inspire." Watch the trailer for Beauty and the Beast below, and see it in theaters on March 17.
